  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Laserska resonančna votlina</string>
            <string language="en">Laser Cavity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laser Raum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavité De Laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cavidade Do Laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cavità Del Laser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοιλότητα λέιζερ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cavidad Del Laser</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje laserske resonančne votline in vpliv položaja vira in goriščnih razdalj ogledal na stabilnost sistema.</string>
            <string language="en">Simulation of laser cavity. The effect of source position, focal point of mirrors on the stability of the system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">laserska resonančna votlina</string>
            <string language="en">laser cavity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optična aplikacija</string>
            <string language="en">optical application</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation des Laser Raums. Der Effekt der 
Quellposition, Schwerpunkt der Spiegel auf der Stabilität des 
Systems.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulation de cavité de laser. L'effet de 
la position de source, point focal des miroirs sur la stabilité du 
système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulação da cavidade do laser. O efeito 
da posição da fonte, ponto focal dos espelhos na estabilidade do 
sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazione della cavità del laser. 
L'effetto della posizione di sorgente, punto focale degli 
specchi sulla stabilità del sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοίωση της κοιλότητας λέιζερ. Η επίδραση 
της θέσης πηγής, σημείο εστίασης των καθρεφτών στη σταθερότητα 
του συστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulación de la cavidad del laser. El 
efecto de la posición de la fuente, punto focal de espejos en la 
estabilidad del sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laser Raum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Anwendung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cavité de laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">application optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cavidade do laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aplicação ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cavità del laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">applicazione ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοιλότητα λέιζερ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική εφαρμογή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cavidad del laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aplicación óptica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
